text: Insomnia Cookies is a chain of bakeries in the United States. It specializes in delivering warm cookies, baked goods, and ice cream.http://www.bizjournals.com/philadelphia/news/2013/03/08/another-place- to-get-a-cookie-at-3-in.html It was founded by two students that attended the University of Pennsylvania in 2003. The company has more than 200 stores throughout the continental United States. Many stores are close to universities and serve students who want to order cookies late at night. ==References== Category:American food companies
title: Insomnia Cookies
